locations.name: Waiheke Island
locations.description: A haven of beaches, art, and vineyards near Auckland, likely the first romantic stay.

locations.name: Rotorua
locations.description: Known for geothermal activity, Maori culture, and unique spa experiences.

locations.name: Queenstown
locations.description: Adventure capital set by Lake Wakatipu, offering stunning alpine scenery, adventure activities, and fine dining.

locations.name: Sydney
locations.description: Australia's iconic harbour city, featuring the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and vibrant urban life.

locations.name: Hamilton Island (Whitsundays)
locations.description: A key resort island within the Whitsundays, offering access to the Great Barrier Reef, pristine beaches, and sailing opportunities.

locations.name: Yulara (for Uluru/Ayers Rock)
locations.description: The gateway resort town for exploring the spiritual heart of Australia: Uluru (Ayers Rock) and Kata Tjuta.
